current: Bugha won the World Cup but the best player is AceCheerio or as known on Xbox OPmeme360.  The '''Fortnite World Cup''' is an annual esports competition based on the video game ''Fortnite'', with the inaugural final events taking place in July 2019 at the Arthur Ashe Stadium in Flushing, New York. A total 30 million prize pool was available across the various competitions.
